message.content:
```json
{
  "module_name": "VinylRecordsManager",
  "reviewed_prompt": "Design a software module to help users manage their vinyl record collections. The module should allow users to catalog their records, track their listening habits, and discover new music based on their collection. Users should be able to add, update, delete, and search records in their collection. The module should also provide insights into their collection, such as most listened-to records, genres, and artists. Additionally, the module should offer recommendations for new records based on the user's existing collection.",
  "functional_details": [
    "Catalog vinyl records with detailed information",
    "Track listening habits and history",
    "Provide insights and statistics about the collection",
    "Offer recommendations for new records based on the collection"
  ],
  "user_interaction": [
    "Add a new vinyl record to the collection",
    "Update or delete an existing record",
    "Search for records by various criteria (artist, genre, title, etc.)",
    "View statistics and insights about the collection",
    "Receive recommendations for new records"
  ],
  "minimum_features": [
    "CRUDS operations for vinyl records",
    "Basic search functionality",
    "Simple statistics (e.g., count of records by genre)"
  ],
  "desired_features": [
    "Advanced search with filters",
    "Detailed statistics and insights",
    "Listening history tracking",
    "Basic recommendation system"
  ],
  "bar_raiser_features": [
    "Integration with music databases for automatic record information retrieval",
    "Social features (e.g., sharing collection with friends)",
    "Advanced recommendation system with machine learning",
    "Mobile app integration for barcode scanning"
  ],
  "data_models": [
    "**VinylRecord**: { 'id': 'string', 'title': 'string', 'artist': 'string', 'genre': 'string', 'release_year': 'number', 'condition': 'string', 'notes': 'string', 'cover_image_url': 'string' }",
    "**ListeningSession**: { 'id': 'string', 'record_id': 'string', 'date': 'date', 'duration': 'number', 'notes': 'string' }",
    "**User**: { 'id': 'string', 'name': 'string', 'email': 'string', 'preferences': 'object' }",
    "**Recommendation**: { 'id': 'string', 'record_id': 'string', 'user_id': 'string', 'reason': 'string', 'date': 'date' }"
  ]
}
```
